title: Phone call sound level adjusting problem
content:
Hello,
 i am experiencing some sound problems on my Pixel 4a 5g. The problem appear when i call from phone. When i do that  i can't change the call volume. Its always on maximum level. The volume indicator goes up and down and the speaker is always on maximum volume. Even when i down it to minimum sound level does not change. Please help me with this becouse i can't have a normal conversation and at some pointy my ear is going to bleed.

Thank You in advance!
